articles.title: Ramaphosa re-elected to lead South Africa’s ruling party - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: Pragmatic, wealthy and ambitious Cyril Ramaphosa was re-elected leader of South Africa's ruling party, African National Congress, on Monday, despite being badly damaged by a cash-heist scandal that had dogged him for months.
